content: Go left first and tackle the Bull Soldier, then look underneath the first curved portion of the bridge to absorb a green Wisp.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rakshasa Palace'.
The content is as follows:
Go left first and tackle the Bull Soldier, then look underneath the first curved portion of the bridge to absorb a green Wisp.
